<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"A successful response.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"QueryParamsResponse is response type for the Query/Params RPC method.","type":"object","properties":{"params":{"description":"params holds all the parameters of this module.","type":"object","properties":{"bond_denom":{"description":"bond_denom defines the bondable coin denomination.","type":"string"},"historical_entries":{"description":"historical_entries is the number of historical entries to persist.","type":"integer","format":"int64"},"max_entries":{"description":"max_entries is the max entries for either unbonding delegation or redelegation (per pair/trio).","type":"integer","format":"int64"},"max_validators":{"description":"max_validators is the maximum number of validators.","type":"integer","format":"int64"},"min_commission_rate":{"type":"string","title":"min_commission_rate is the chain-wide minimum commission rate that a validator can charge their delegators"},"unbonding_time":{"description":"unbonding_time is the time duration of unbonding.","type":"string"}}}}}}}},"default":{"description":"An unexpected error response.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"code":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"details":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"@type":{"type":"string"}},"additionalProperties":{}}},"message":{"type":"string"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
